channel.title: Comby Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Comby news and events.

item.title: A simple program reducer for any language
item.description: I’ve been fuzzing compilers for less familiar languages like Solidity and Diem (for smart contracts), and up-and-coming languages like Zig. More on that fuzzing effort here. A fun part of that is looking at programs that crash the compilers. Reducin...

item.title: Comby website gets a refresh
item.description: The old website started off nice and simple and kept everything about comby on one page. As that grew things being unwieldly, and I wanted to partition off the usage documentation and "other things". Another piece of feedback was that the l...
